text: formula one has a reputation for
technology and quality it's synonymous
with those things and therefore Formula
One needed its digital products to hold
be held up to the same standard so
working with AWS support we established
that we needed a more intensive or
higher focus on the stability of our
systems and we worked with AWS to
establish those metrics that were
critical for us to monitor through a
race weekend IDR is a a suite of
monitoring tools that allow AWS and F1
and our partners to agree on a set of
thresholds whether that's in Media
Services or
cloudfront and so we set those
thresholds together and then there are
pre-planned and pre-agreed responses
should anything creep above those
thresholds ultimately IDR gives us the
confidence that we're providing a
quality product to our customers at the
end of the day a fan turns up at the
race weekend and what they want is to
see the program in high quality
uninterrupted and IDR can give us the
confidence that through those heightened
periods of usage that we can provide
that quality product
